# Setup knitr
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = getwd())
```

```{r load_packages}
# Data wrangling
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape2)
```

# Load data
``` {r load_data}

# TGC metadata template
tgc_data <- read_csv("/Users/lshzd1/Desktop/Fiji_Typhi/assemblies/Typhi Metadata Template.csv",
                     col_types = cols(.default = "c"))

# PW template with ID column
pw_ids <- read_csv("/Users/lshzd1/Desktop/Fiji_Typhi/assemblies/metadata.csv")

# Get date for naming new sheet
todays_date <- str_replace_all(Sys.Date(),"-","")
```

# Clean up data and wrange into PW format
``` {r}
pw_format <- tgc_data %>% 
  # Curate location data
  mutate(Country_Origin = ifelse(
    `Travel Associated` == "Yes", `Travel Country`, Country)) %>% 
  # name columns for PW
  mutate(tgc_id=`Data Accession`) %>% 
  # Add GPS data columns
  mutate(latitude = "Not Provided") %>%
  mutate(longitude = "Not Provided") %>%
  mutate(accuracy = "Not Provided") %>%
  # select columns for PW metadata
  select(`Data Accession`, 
         `Study Accession`, 
         `Sample Accession`, 
         Country, 
         City,
         `Travel Associated`, 
         `Travel Country`, 
         `Country_Origin`,
         `Purpose of Sampling`,
         `Isolating Lab`,
         `Lab Contact`,
         Source,
         `Host Health State`,
         Strain, 
         PMID,
         latitude,
         longitude,
         accuracy,
         Year,
         Month,
         Day) %>% 
  # rename cols for PW formatting
  rename(accession=`Data Accession`,
         `project accession`=`Study Accession`,
         biosample=`Sample Accession`,
         `country isolated`=Country,
         `country of origin`=Country_Origin,
         `travel associated`=`Travel Associated`,
         `travel country`=`Travel Country`, 
         source=Source,
         literaturelink=PMID,
         `purpose of sampling`=`Purpose of Sampling`,
         lab=`Isolating Lab`,
         location=City,
         `symptom status`=`Host Health State`,
         contact=`Lab Contact`,
         strain=Strain,
         year=Year,
         month=Month,
         day=Day) %>%
  # Fix missing values
  replace(is.na(.), "") %>% # change NA to blank
  mutate_all(funs(str_replace(., "Not Provided", ""))) # change 'Not Provided' to blank

```

# Merge in internal PW ids
```{r add_internal_pw_ids}

# Get internal PW id and accession. number
pw_ids <- pw_ids %>%
  select(id, `data accession`) %>%
  rename(accession= `data accession`)

# Merge PW id into metadata
pw_format <- pw_format %>%
  left_join(., pw_ids) %>%
  relocate(id)

```

# Output new sheet
```{r output_new_sheet}

# Output PW compatible metadata
write_csv(pw_format, paste0(dirname("/Users/lshzd1/Desktop/Fiji_Typhi/assemblies/Typhi Metadata Template.csv"), "/" , 
                            todays_date, " ",basename("/Users/lshzd1/Desktop/Fiji_Typhi/assemblies/Typhi Metadata Template.csv")))

```
